issue.title: [R] GCS/S3 Improvements
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18180](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18180). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Umbrella ticket for issues relating to improvements to functionality relating to GCS and S3.
